text: Niagara County is a county in the U.S. state of New York. As of the 2020 census, 212,666 people lived there. The county seat is Lockport. It is on the border with the Canadian province of Ontario. It is the location of Niagara Falls and Fort Niagara, and has many parks and lake shore recreation communities. ==References== Category:New York (state) counties
title: Niagara County, New York
